Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Hi Support, I have a message in the system "Your profile is rejected.  Please contact adsuppport@newsbreak.com for help."

Hi there! It seems like your profile has been rejected. To resolve this, please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with details about your account and any relevant information you might have received. They'll be able to assist you further with this issue.
How long does it take to get an ad approved
The ad approval process usually takes between 1-2 business days. Sometimes it can be even earlier, thanks to our awesome Ad Ops team!
its been well over 2 days now

I'm sorry to hear that your ad is still pending. If your account is new and hasn't been verified yet, it might be causing the delay. Could you please provide the following details so we can proceed with the verification process?
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once you have this information, please email it to adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification. Our team will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status.
